xml:
Migraleve<tm tmtype="reg"/> Indications and dose

Acute migraine

By mouth

  • Child 15–17 years

    Initially 2 tablets, (pink tablets) to be taken at onset of attack, followed by 2 tablets every 4 hours if required, (yellow tablets) to be taken following initial dose; maximum 2 pink and 6 yellow tablets in 24 hours.

  • Adult

    Initially 2 tablets, (pink tablets) to be taken at onset of attack, followed by 2 tablets every 4 hours if required, (yellow tablets) to be taken following initial dose; maximum 2 pink and 6 yellow tablets in 24 hours.

Acute migraine

By mouth

  • Child 12–14 years

    Initially 1 tablet, (pink tablet) to be taken at onset of attack, or if it is imminent, followed by 1 tablet every 4 hours if required, (yellow tablet) to be taken following initial dose; maximum 1 pink and 3 yellow tablets in 24 hours.

 Less suitable for prescribing

Migraleve is less suitable for prescribing.
Clinical medicinal product information Clinical medicinal product information
